attributes.title: Remove
attributes.review: Please remove the app. I don’t understand why people get the app. America has no chance at being “great” if trump is still president. Thanks for understanding

attributes.title: The weird or orange
attributes.review: 🌈Fairy 🧚‍♀️✨I wanted to stay informed with everything then remembered something.......... trump is an idiot! Very bad app I’m very disappointed in out Cheeto of a president. Also blm, lgbt lives matter. YOU CANT SILENCE US. Have a Terrible day✨🧚‍♀️🌈

attributes.title: 😹😹😹😹 this app suks
attributes.review:
People love that I hate myself

Yeah, they love that I hate myself

People love that I hate myself

People love that I hate myself

People love that I hate myself

I climbed out of my head

And watched myself implode

A thought without a body

Ought to be the shot to take a load off

My brain is poisoned

And I’m searching for the antidote

But every time I find it

My defenses scream “oh, no you don’t!”

Woah 😨

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!
attributes.review: this took so long to download not to mention the amount if viruses and other issues i got from this app..absolutely horrible...

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: This app messes up my phone when i'm using it, it makes my phone go off randomly i think trump is trying to control our phones.

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: this app is the absolute WORST. it kept glitching out and tbh, i hated seeing the bunker boy when i opened the app. it made me SICK. don’t use this app if you like to be productive- it’s such a waste of time.

attributes.title: Phone broke & lost money
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and my phone immediately stopped working and my bank account got drained! I am so upset.
Hi this app took bout a week to download n once it did it made my phone crash and took all my data n now Thxs to this app I had to get a whole new phone

attributes.title: I actually went blind when I downloaded this app
attributes.review: never in all my born days have I ever encountered an app so disgusting. it’s a threat to national security and to human life as a whole. absolutely horrid.
